subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Women)
lead_paragraph: Once feeling like an outsider as a man coaching women, and wondering whether he would find more fulfillment coaching men, Geno Auriemma has come to terms with his career path.
snippet: Once feeling like an outsider as a man coaching women, and wondering whether he would find more fulfillment coaching men, Geno Auriemma has come to terms with his career path.
